thread.title: Nigeria: Osinbajo in Zambia to Commission Dangote Cement Plant
thread.title_full: Nigeria: Osinbajo in Zambia to Commission Dangote Cement Plant

title: Nigeria: Osinbajo in Zambia to Commission Dangote Cement Plant
text:
South Africa: Durban Bridge to Be Assessed After Tanker Fire By Levinus Nwabughiogu 
Abuja — Vice President, Professor Yemi Osinbajo has left Abuja Zambia on a one-day official visit to the country. 
Osinbajo will be meeting with the Zambian President and Vice President, Mr. Edgar Chagwa Lungu and Vice President Inonge Wina respectively. 
The trio will be participating in the commissioning of the 1.5 million tonnes Dangote Cement plant and 30 MW coal-fired power plant in Ndola, Zambia tomorrow after which the Vice President would return to Abuja. Nigeria
